title: Mizani Smooth Guard Serum, Thermasmooth, 3.4 Ounce
description: 3.4 ounce serum. Thermasmooth smooth guard serum was launched by the design house of mizani. It is recommended for daily use. Please store in a cool dry place. Thermasmooth smooth guard serum by mizani for unisex, 3.4 ounce serum.

title: Mizani Coconut Souffle Light Moisturizing Hairdress for Unisex, 8 Ounce
description: Coconut souffle light moisturizing hairdress by Mizani for unisex 8 ounce hairdress. Coconut souffle light moisturizing hairdress was launched by the design house of Mizani. It is recommended for normal hair.

title: OGX Shampoo, Anti-Breakage Keratin Oil, 13oz
description: Indulge in rich, fortifying keratin proteins that reinforce each strand, increasing elasticity to resist breakage caused by brushing and styling, while argan oil conditions and smoothes creating a luminescent shine. Strands are strengthened from within and nourished throughout for longer, stronger hair.
